titles.title: American Burying Beetle Relief Act of 2014
A bill to remove the American burying beetle from the list of endangered species under the Endangered Species Act (16 U.S.C. 1531 et seq.).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 7/29/2014--Introduced. American Burying Beetle Relief Act of 2014 - Removes the United States Fish and Wildlife Service's listing of the American burying beetle as an endangered species under the Endangered Species Act. Prohibits the beetle from being listed as a threatened or endangered species.
